snippet: Mitt Romney’s depiction of 47 percent of America as wealth takers touched on some unsettling facts about politics and wealth distribution.
abstract: Tyler Cohen Economic View points out Mitt Romney’s depiction of 47 percent of America as wealth takers rather than wealth makers touched inadvertently on some discomforting truths about the importance of politics in income distribution in the United States; imagines Romney's points reformulated in a more defensible direction.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney’s depiction of 47 percent of America as wealth takers touched on some unsettling facts about politics and wealth distribution.
